v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I love my Shepherd’s voice: His watchful eye shall keep My wand’ring soul among The thousands of His sheep: He feeds His flock, He calls their names, His bosom bears the tender lambs.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My Savior and my Lord, My Conqu’ror and my King, Thy scepter and Thy sword, Thy reigning grace I sing: Thine is the pow’r; behold I sit In willing bonds beneath Thy feet.{/lang-eng}
